CustomField.description:
Unaware: 1 or less unique visitors within last 30 days Aware: 2+ unique visitors within last 30 days Engaged: 1+ Moments within last 30 days OR more than 1 active self-service org Consideration: 1+ Open Journey with a Meeting Booked OR 1+ Journeys with a Meeting Booked 30 days ago Decision: 1+ Open Opportunities Committed Customer: Account Status (Committed) = Active Customer Disqualified: Account Status (Committed) = Disqualified
External Systems Utilization: Polytomic
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Unaware: 1 or less unique visitors within last 30 days Aware: 2+ unique visitors within last 30 days Engaged: 1+ Moments within last 30 days OR more than 1 active self-service org Consideration: 1+ Open Journey with a Meeting Booked OR 1+ Journeys with a Meeting Booked 30 days ago Decision: 1+ Open Opportunities Committed Customer: Account Status (Committed) = Active Customer Disqualified: Account Status (Committed) = Disqualified
CustomField.label: Account Status (Prospect)
